H0.text: Name one of the mascots of the 2012 Summer Olympics.. Boris

H1.text: Name one of the mascots of the 2012 Summer Olympics.. Olympy

H2.text: Name one of the mascots of the 2012 Summer Olympics.. Londy

H3.text: Name one of the mascots of the 2012 Summer Olympics.. Wenlock/Mandeville

A4.text: Wenlock and Mandeville are the official mascots for the 2012 Summer Olympics and Paralympic Games.
